com.customlbs.library

Class TileRequester

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.customlbs.library.TileRequester

  • public class TileRequester
extends java.lang.Object

    Request tile bitmaps from service.

    One instance is recommended and can serve tiles for any building retrieved via Indoors.getBuilding(Building, LoadingBuildingCallback) or IndoorsLocationListener.

    Methods are thread-safe. You can call methods from a separate paint thread without further synchronization.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  TileRequester.TileRequestCallback
      Callback associated with TileRequester to retrieve requested tiles.

      • cancelTile

        public void cancelTile(TileKey tile)

        Cancel a tile request.

        Unless TileRequester.TileRequestCallback.tileFinished(TileKey, Bitmap) was already called, the tile request will be canceled.
